newsitem.title: USA: Jordan buys 100,000 tonnes of wheat - exporters.
newsitem.headline: Jordan buys 100,000 tonnes of wheat - exporters.

text.p: Jordan bought 100,000 tonnes of optional origin wheat at its tender on Wednesday, split equally between first half and last half October shipment, U.S. exporters said.
The wheat includes 10,000 tonnes of soft wheat priced around $200.00 per tonne and 90,000 tonnes of hard wheat at $206.00, cost and freight.
